privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Learn how we protect and handle your personal information
privacy.introduction: At EventHub, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our event booking platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and billing information when you create an account or make a booking. We also collect usage data to improve our services.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to process bookings, communicate with you about your events, send important updates, improve our services, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We may share your information with event organizers, payment processors, and service providers. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience and analyze our website traffic. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of marketing communications at any time.

changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes via email or through the platform.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform
terms.introduction: By accessing and using EventHub, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using this platform.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using our platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You must provide accurate information when creating an account and maintain the security of your account. You are responsible for all activities under your account.

bookings.title: Event Bookings
bookings.content: All bookings are subject to availability and the event organizer's terms. You must provide accurate booking information and comply with the event's rules and regulations.

payments.title: Payments and Fees
payments.content: Payment must be made in full at the time of booking. All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated in the event's cancellation policy.

cancellations.title: Cancellations and Refunds
cancellations.content: Cancellation policies vary by event. Refunds are subject to the event organizer's policy and may be subject to processing fees.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: You agree not to use the platform for any illegal purpose, violate any laws, infringe on others' rights, or interfere with the platform's operation.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: EventHub shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the platform.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the platform.
